Name: Endless Heck
About the game: Fight off endless enemy waves and make it to the exit to progress to the next level. If you die...you start all over again Features Procedurally generated levels, there are an endless amount of them. Simple keyboard and mouse controls. Mousewheel Zooming Game Modes Version 2 Endless Heck Fight off endless enemy waves and make it to the exit to progress to the next level. If you die...you start all over again. Version 1 Race Mode Race Mode is a battle to get to the exit as fast as you can against the AI. Slingshot Mode Slingshot your way to the exit as fast as you can, by dragging your mouse to aim and fire. Explode Mode Avoid the walls and get to the exit as fast as you can. Sprint Mode In this mode you can hit the walls, use it to practice a run before entering Explode Mode or Rogue Mode Rogue Mode The ultimate challenge! Hit the wall, you die and go all the way back to level 1. Countdown Mode You have 10 seconds to get the exit. Don't hit the walls!
